nodes.title: Support implicit bean names for factories and injection points
added doc text for using logback
Correct location of micronaut-validation native-image configuration
Fix beans in packages with uppercase letters
Stream body for error responses if no status route present
Fix list value of map key not being added to catalog
Ensure members of repeatable parents get added to annotation metadata
Use `Map.of` and `List.of` for generated annotation metadata if available
Support for introspections on public / package protected fields
Create Netty socket instance instead of using reflection to create
Fix HttpClientSenderFactory / ensure circular bean errors are caught
Add support for producing beans from fields
Bean introspection: store constructor arguments in a field instead of recreating the array
JacksonMediaTypeCodec - write directly to the buffer
Use the correct type for building annotation metadata of config builder arguments
Added doc for Filter annotation path pattern matching
Added Support for specifying range on random number in properties
Allow to change Netty's resource leak detection
Support for removing annotations in a visitor
make SimpleCookie#toString return a Set-Cookie compliant value
Ensure visited annotations for visitors can be visited downstream
Adds GCP Secret Manager to BOM
setting JAEGER_SERVICE_NAME system prop if not present in system prop and env var
Allow synthesizing metadata from different source annotation
Skip once per request on error
Customize multipart decoder to prevent releasing of in memory data
Check for multi-valued headers in a header map that encodes headers as strings
Fix issues with client prepending uri is a query string starting with "?".
build: bump Micronaut AWS from 2.6.0 to 2.7.0
Bug when a filter modify a request
Fixes null body inconsistency inside HttpRequest
Default bean names for methods should follow java bean convention
Fix annotate not working when invoked multiple times by different visitors
bump up azure functions java library version to 1.4.2
Fix regression caused by #5306 with running tests in parallel
feat: HttpHeadersUtils to normalize HTTP Header name
Fixes named without a value on types and stereotypes
fix: reset lb index on out of bound exception
Fix jakarta annotations appearing in stereotypes
Avoiding NPE exception when cookie is undecodable
AnnotationTransformer and AnnotationMapper should be consistent regarding repeatable annotations
Fix transformed / remapped annotations not being handled
Select the bean with the highest precedence as specified by Order annotation
Fix issues with proxy target and beans from factories
Use 'extension' field in exception message because it more informative then 'fileName'
Fix problems with generics injection / deprecate concrete type lookup
Check TypeMirror is Wildcard before accessing getSuperBound for Kotlin suspend methods
Fix regression with beans that implement iterable and filter order
fix building with eclipse ecj for micronaut 2.5.1
Allow customizing the custom scope registry
Disable downloading javadoc and sources in IntelliJ IDEA.
Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from v3.8.2 to v3.9.1
Add tests and fixes for issue #5187
added logging chapter and moved parts
Add nullable to methodInterceptor, update docs
Use the owning type name for child factory beans. Fixes #5704
Filter out any beans for containsBean for non any qualifier
Gracefully handle the absence of javax.inject
Add note to section on Nullable Annotations about When.MAYBE warning
Implement the ability to customize if compilation fails for proxyTarget=true
Don't swallow errors constructing the request uri
Fix memory leak with input stream body
Allow ClientArgumentBinders that can bind the whole request & make QueryValue more flexible
Support defining additional type arguments in BeanBuilder
Extract http compile time validation to a new module
add back json subscriber and doAfterNext
fix qualifier arguments incorrectly annotated with NonNull
Don't pick preDestroy methods with arguments.
Fix NPE with retrieving subprotocol in @OnOpen websocket method.
Filter out @Any beans for Object lookup. Fixes #5639
Fix annotation metadata on adapter advice for Groovy
Only error if enum actually declared bean. Fixes #5611
Fix for custom reason phrase is inaccessible in filters when using Netty runtime
Use javax Nullable instead of Nonnull
Include Maven configuration for javaParameters option
Trim element collection in env property
docs: fix V8 class name reference
CurrentSession is deprecated and shouldn't be mapped to
Reworks the CustomScope interface to support disposing dependent instances.
checkstyle: no import if only used in javadoc
Fix issue preventing an interceptor implementing both interfaces
Bring back stereotype and annotation mapper changes from 3.x. Add stereotype processing for repeatable
Provide better error message with Adapter on Kotlin suspend method.
fix: declarative client with suspended function fails on 404
Do not use `@Introspected` for generating GraalVM reflect config. Use `@ReflectiveAccess`
Support defining new beans from type element visitors
Test for checking if a ClassElement is an enum
Generate error when private methods are annotated with @Around advice
Remove GraalVM resource generation for Graal visitor
Remove GraalVM resource generation for Graal visitor
adding config to add default keep alive header
Remove GraalVM resource generation for Graal visitor
Only expose EventLoopGroup as an injection type for the Netty default loop
Delay emission of response headers until at least 1 item is emitted in a streaming response
Fix support for generics and factory beans. Fixes #5786
Make resource loader fix GraalVM compatible. Fixes #5765
Correct how AOP proxy is generated
Test and fix for NoSuchMethodError in 3.0 snapshots
Fix bug with composite beans from factories. Fixes #5776
Upgrade Netty to 4.1.66 and Netty-tcnative to 2.0.40
build: bump up reactor from 3.4.7 to 3.4.8
Ensure type arguments are available for introduction advice bean definitions
Delete deprecated annotations and switch the metadata to the new ones
build: bump up Micronaut RxJava2 to 1.0.0-M2
build: bump up Micronaut RxJava 3 to 2.0.0-M1
build: bump up Micronaut Reactor to 2.0.0-M1
doc: @EventListener as Inherited in breaks' table
Allow ClientArgumentBinders that can bind the whole request & allow binders to add repeating query parameter values
fix: onError emit closeBracket if openBracket sent
Register inner classes of classes annotated with @ReflectiveAccess
Handle more cases on Graal visitor
Make javax.persistence.Entity require all access reflection
build: updates yaml, Jackson, slf4j, jaeger, testcontainers
Fix annotation api version in BOM
Remove support for runtime classpath scanning with ASM
Implement constructor element queries for GroovyClassElement
Use ChannelPipelineCustomizer.HANDLER_SSL from ssl handler on server
Provide unmatched MediaType extension from fileUpload
Fix name in link for Open Rewrite feature
Add utility method to convert `Annotation[]` to `Qualifier`
Correct composite qualifier's `contains` check for another composite qualifier
Add a test for subset qualifiers injection
Change always serialize errors as list default value
Support adding stereotypes to annotation from a visitor
Mark some jackson-related classes as internal
Move the server request key to ServerRequestContext
Improve support for primitive arrays in annotation metadata
System and environment properties not overriding application.yml for logger configuration
Add Improvements BeanBuilder API (factory beans, lifecycle methods for BeanElemenVisitor)
Fix inconsistent behaviour between remappers and transformers
Allow injection for fields with qualifiers without the presence of Inject
Fixes field injection that has both Value/Property and Inject for Java
Support more Optional* types in config properties
Make built in bean references extensible
Makes the behaviour of a missing provider configurable
Add support for visiting BeanElements before they are written
Test and fix NoSuchMethodError with AroundConstruct
Fix regression: ServerRequestContext not accessible in WebSocket filters
Allow access to PackageElement from ClassElement
Create inject-kotlin-test module for directly testing kapt processing in unit tests
Add formatting to query values via the @Format annotation
Add test for withValue and data classes
use type variable support for providers
Move non Netty specific handlers outside of Netty specific module
Fix generics for super interfaces on factories
Fix for custom validators on nested pojos
feat: allow SameSite case insensitive binding
Initial support for factories for primitive types
Extract Jackson dependencies to their own modules
Fix names of inner annotations in metadata
refactor: extract static method for shouldDeduceEnvironment
test: add @RestoreSystemProperties to test modifying system Properties
fix: if proxy request is not mutable call mutate
the netty unicast processor is not emitting errors for downstream subscribers
Initial work to modernize the Gradle build
Delegate bean resolution context when resolving proxy target
Fix issue with post construct before getter/setter in config props
Moving `NotNull` annotation in front of FQN.
Make DefaultFileSystemResourceLoader lazy to be able to retrieve files that didn't exist on startup
http-client: Deserialize Map<K, V> with Jackson properly
Do not override 'latest' docs when publishing 2.5.x release
Don't use emitter after it's been cancelled
Allow for multiple calls to close for the input stream returned by CompletedFileUpload when the backing data is on disk
Fix class generation of getExposedTypes method. Fix docs
doc: fix broken links in docs
doc: correct mention to renamed class
doc: link to CacheEndpoint section not javadoc
moved the OpenRewrite section to the top and clarified usage
[docs] fix small typo in rx http client dependency in upgrading doc
Add New Relic Micrometer registry to BOM
Fixes URITemplate to parse query param
Adds a getter for cron expression
Delegate overridden method in AOP proxy
Mark some properties on Resource classes with their correct property names
Use argument context to determine conversion type even for scalar values
Support for receiver type & throws clause in MethodElement API
Updates toString of CronExpression to return the underlying cron expression as string.
Allow socket address converter to handle urls with schemes
Fix max not being inclusive for BigInteger and BigDecimal
Fix referencing a local static variable in an annotation with Groovy
feat: disable endpoints filter via configuration
fix: don't load endpointsfilter if securityfilter
Attempt to load all possible property sources to determine if the bootstrap env should be started
Add a new InjectScope annotation for beans scoped to the injection point
Expose more generics information in ClassElement API
Look through interfaces for pre destroy methods
Store repeatable annotations info and avoid reflection call
Respect configured property inclusion in BeanIntrospectionPropertyWriter
Bean introspection with method dispatch and static metadata
Remove unused imports to fix checkstyle
Run graal annotation processor for jackson-databind module [Fixes #6205]
Add ElementType.ANNOTATION_TYPE to all tracing annotations
Applying @Format to query param duplicated in URI
Fixes setting up of duplicate headers in MutableHttpMessage. Fixes #6192
Fix race condition with writing last http content
* Adds a toString() method to DefaultConstraintViolation
#6181 Handle exception thrown from http filter.
Correct Kotlin coroutine server request propagation
Propagate Reactor context to Kotlin coroutines if `kotlinx-coroutines-reactor` is present
docs: clarify return values in isEmpty/isNotEmpty/hasText
Changes an exception message to be more informative Fixes issue-5418
build: bump up Micronaut Views version to 3.0.1
Do not forward onComplete before all elements have been processed
Parse JDBC url to only print host/port/path when the datasource is down
Support an API to start multiple netty servers
Fix infinite loop when requesting demand in SingleThreadedBufferingSubscriber
Only include JDBC url in detail map.
DefaultHttpHostResolver should not return port -1 when HOST header is missing (#6139)
Allow refreshing the server SSL configuration using a RefreshEvent
Add a sanity check to make sure that the catalog is valid
Add missing libraries to the BOM
Bind to port zero get random port.
test: ClientFilter reactor ctx has req in flatMap
Correctly handle absence of request in RequestScope
Don't block the event loop when reading inputstream.
Return proper type from JavaVisitorContext.getClassElement for enum elements
Don't emit response if the argument is void
fix: access parent request from Reactor Context in HTTP ClientFilter
Fix custom validator with non object class during cascade from a list
feat: allow SameSite case insensitive binding
